  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:bioo_es_20070518_2_0030409</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>bioo_es_20070518_2_0030409</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Reino Animales</string>
            <string language="en">The animal kingdom</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Tierkönigreich</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le royaume animal</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O reino animal</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il regno animale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το ζωικό βασίλειο</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Se analizan las características de las generales del Reino Animales y continúa analizando los grupos de Diblásticos, Platelmintos, Nematodos, Anélidos y Moluscos, expuesto en forma de tabla comparativa.</string>
            <string language="en">Topic analysing the general characteristics of the animal kingdom and which goes on the analyse the groups of diploblastic organisms, platyhelminthes, nematodes, annelids and molluscs, presented in a comparative table.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biosfera</string>
            <string language="en">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Reino Animales</string>
            <string language="en">Kingdom of animals</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biología</string>
            <string language="en">Biology</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Thema, welches die allgemeinen Eigenschaften 
des Tierkönigreiches und das analysiert, auf analysieren die Gruppen 
der diploblastic organismen, der platyhelminthes, der Fadenwürmer, 
der Annelids und der Mollusken geht, dargestellt in einer 
vergleichbaren Tabelle.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le sujet analysant les caractéristiques 
générales du royaume animal et qui va sur l'analyse les groupes 
d'organizations, de platyhelminthes, de nématodes, d'annélides 
diploblastic et de mollusques, présentés dans une table comparative.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O tópico que analisa as características gerais 
do reino animal e que vai na análise os grupos dos organismos, dos 
platyhelminthes, dos nematodes, de anelídeos diploblastic e dos 
molluscs, apresentados em uma tabela comparativa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il soggetto che analizza le caratteristiche 
generali del regno animale e che va sull'analizz i gruppi degli 
organismi, dei platyhelminthes, dei nematodi, degli anellidi 
diploblastic e dei molluschi, presentati in una tabella comparativa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το θέμα που αναλύει τα γενικά χαρακτηριστικά του 
ζωικού βασίλειου και που πηγαίνει αναλύει τις ομάδες 
diploblastic οργανισμών, platyhelminthes, nematodes, 
annelids και μαλακίων, που παρουσιάζονται σε έναν συγκριτικό 
πίνακα.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biosphäre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Königreich der Tiere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">biosphère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Royaume des animaux</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Reino dos animais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Biologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">biosfera</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Regno degli animali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Biologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">βιόσφαιρα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βασίλειο των ζώων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η βιολογία</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
